definition: to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: That block of time you just scheduled has to be given the utmost priority.
sentences.chinese: 你安排出來的時間應該置頂爲首要任務。

sentences.english: Look at the top post, and you will find the information about our party venue.
sentences.chinese: 看看“置頂”，你會找到關於聚會地點的信息。

sentences.english: Specifies whether the sticky notes are visible on ALL workspaces on the desktop, or not.
sentences.chinese: 指定置頂便箋是否在所有工作空間中可見。

sentences.english: How to Unstick Your Button Maker Machine.
sentences.chinese: 如何取消置頂你的按鈕製造機。

sentences.english: Plz keep this thread up… It is soo sweet to read this article here.
sentences.chinese: 讓這帖子繼續置頂吧，讀這些評論，太有意思了。

sentences.english: Default width for new sticky notes in pixels.
sentences.chinese: 以像素爲單位的新置頂便箋默認寬度。

sentences.english: Why do not see new posts List?
sentences.chinese: 現在只能看到置頂貼，沒有帖子列表？

definition: to post (an item on a forum)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
